metadata.description: Refined entity model for Revenue Stream Hijacking case 2025-137857
metadata.changes: Refinement 2025-11-25: Enhanced GitHub Pages references, added direct evidence URLs, validated cross-references

persons.name: Rynette Farrar
persons.additional_notes: Controlled accounts system, potentially opened 8 ABSA accounts using stolen card

persons.name: Linda
persons.additional_notes: Employed to do books while Rynette controlled accounts system
ad_res_j7_references: Bookkeeping records while Rynette controlled accounts

persons.name: Danie Bantjies
persons.additional_notes: Unknown trustee status, dismissed audit request June 10, 2025 (4 days after fraud exposure), controlled accounting system with Rynette using Peter's email, owes R18.685M to trust creating massive conflict of interest, certified Peter's affidavit as Commissioner of Oaths despite material omissions, sent trial balance email Aug 13, 2020; Sent trial balance email Aug 13, 2020 to Bernadine Wright; learned of criminal matters June 10, 2025; ENS Africa suppressed criminal information from Court Aug 29, 2025
ad_res_j7_references: Trial balance email Aug 13, 2020 to Bernadine Wright

persons.name: Kayla
persons.additional_notes: Court order obtained to seize account from Kayla's email, interfering with law enforcement investigation that had instructed freeze
ad_res_j7_references: Court order for email account seizure

persons.name: Gee
persons.additional_notes: Sent email to Jax in August explaining instruction to send 'don't use regima.zone only use regimaskin.co.za email' on June 20, 2025, direct witness to coordinated customer diversion scheme
ad_res_j7_references: Email to Jax explaining domain switch instruction

persons.name: Bernadine Wright
persons.additional_notes: Recipient of trial balance email from Bantjies on August 13, 2020, meeting for financial statement finalization, witness to Bantjies' control of financial systems
persons.role_clarification: Recipient of trial balance email from Bantjies, witness to his financial system control
ad_res_j7_references: Recipient of trial balance email Aug 13, 2020

persons.name: Adderory (Rynette's Son)
persons.additional_notes: Rynette's son, registered Adderory companies April 2021 (pre-planning), registered fraudulent domain regimaskin.co.za May 29 2025, supplied same stock type that disappeared from SLG

persons.name: Chantal
persons.additional_notes: Delivered letter about Kayla estate finalization in January 2025, potential witness to estate exploitation
persons.role_clarification: Delivered letter about Kayla estate finalization January 2025
ad_res_j7_references: Suppression of criminal information from Court Aug 29, 2025

persons.name: Jax
persons.additional_notes: Received email from Gee about domain switch instruction, confronted Rynette on May 15, 2025 about R1,035,000 owed to ReZonance

organizations.name: Strategic Logistics Group
organizations.additional_notes: Positioned as loss entity with R13M debt to RST, paid R414K interest Feb 2020, pattern consistent with R5.4M stock lossPositioned as loss entity with R13M debt to RST, paid R414K interest Feb 2020, pattern consistent with R5.4M stock loss

organizations.name: Villa Via
organizations.additional_notes: Director owns half and charges rent to himself; R4.4M monthly rental income, R3.7M profit, R22.8M members loan indicates systematic capital extraction; 86% profit margin on rent

organizations.name: ReZonance (Pty) Ltd
organizations.additional_notes: IT services provider to RegimA Group since 2017, debt is part of Kayla's estate, Jax's confrontation about this debt triggered retaliation sequence

organizations.name: Adderory (Pty) Ltd
organizations.additional_notes: Registered April 2021 (4 years before fraud escalation), demonstrates long-term conspiracy planning, supplied same stock type that disappeared from SLG, registered fraudulent domain regimaskin.co.za

organizations.name: Adderory Skin (Pty) Ltd
organizations.additional_notes: Registered April 2021 alongside Adderory (Pty) Ltd, part of Adderory group for customer hijacking, used RegimA brand for fraud
ad_res_j7_references: See files related to: Adderory, Skin, (Pty)
